text:
Hello everyone,
I am new to HubSpot. I want to create a custom blog layout. Can anyone guide me how to create?

Hi <@UJBDYC03D>! There are great HubSpot Academy lesson about this topic :blush:

If you are completely new to creating templates in HS: *Building HubSpot CMS templates*
<https://app.HubSpot.com/signup/academy?hubs_signup-url=academy.HubSpot.com/courses&intent=academyLesson&lesson=289>

*HubL: The Templating Language of the HubSpot CMS*
<https://app.HubSpot.com/signup/academy?hubs_signup-url=academy.HubSpot.com/courses&intent=academyLesson&lesson=353>

If you have the basics down, but want to know the specifics of creating the special template types (like blog and system pages) in more detail: *Blog, email and system templates in HubSpot CMS*
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/blog-email-and-system-templates-in-the-HubSpot-cms?library=true>
